00054     ~ContextRealLogger();

00109 class ContextZeroLogger
00110 {
00111 public:
00113     inline ContextZeroLogger() {}
00114     
00115     /* Stubby ops */
00116     inline ContextZeroLogger &operator<< (QChar) { return *this;} 
00117     inline ContextZeroLogger &operator<< (char) { return *this;} 
00118     inline ContextZeroLogger &operator<< (signed short) { return *this;} 
00119     inline ContextZeroLogger &operator<< (unsigned short) { return *this;} 
00120     inline ContextZeroLogger &operator<< (signed int) { return *this;} 
00121     inline ContextZeroLogger &operator<< (unsigned int) { return *this;} 
00122     inline ContextZeroLogger &operator<< (signed long) { return *this;} 
00123     inline ContextZeroLogger &operator<< (unsigned long) { return *this;} 
00124     inline ContextZeroLogger &operator<< (float) { return *this;} 
00125     inline ContextZeroLogger &operator<< (double) { return *this;} 
00126     inline ContextZeroLogger &operator<< (const char *) { return *this;} 
00127     inline ContextZeroLogger &operator<< (const QString&) { return *this;} 
00128     inline ContextZeroLogger &operator<< (void *) { return *this;} 
00129     inline ContextZeroLogger &operator<< (const ContextFeature&) { return *this;} 
00130 };

00136 #ifdef CONTEXT_LOG_HIDE_TEST
00137 #define contextTest() (ContextZeroLogger())
00138 #else
00139 #define contextTest() (ContextRealLogger(CONTEXT_LOG_MSG_TYPE_TEST, CONTEXT_LOG_MODULE_NAME, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, __FILE__, __LINE__))
00140 #endif
00141

00146 #endif
